com.lukflug.panelstudio.component

Interface IFixedComponent

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IComponent
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DraggableComponent, DraggableContainer, FixedComponent

    public interface IFixedComponent
extends IComponent
    Interface representing a Component that has a fixed position (i.e. the position isn't determined by the parent via Context).

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods
